channel.title: Assignments on PHI 152

item.title: Assignment 1
item.description: Upload your answer as “Assignment 1” on Gradescope. An email with information about how to upload will follow. For this exercise, you will present several arguments, each in the form of a list of two or more sentences — with at least three usually making things easier! — the last of which is the conclusion. The phrases in each sentence should fit together to make the logical relationships among them clear.
